method.text: Place the stuffing ingredients in a food processor. Process until well blended.

Open out the loin of lamb, fat side down. Spread the stuffing evenly over the meat. Roll up tightly like a Swiss roll. Tie at regular intervals with string. With a sharp knife, cut into eight even rosettes.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Pan fry the noisettes for 6-8 min each side or until cooked through on both sides.
In a saucepan, place all the sauce ingredients. Heat gently for 3 min until thickened slightly.
Serve the lamb noisettes with the redcurrant sauce.
